content:
cfallin commented on Issue #2724:

@sunfishcode, it looks like there is an unrelated and intermittent test failure in wasi_cap_std_sync::poll_oneoff_stdio here -- would you mind taking a look? I'll go ahead and re-trigger the tests to see if it passes this time.

sunfishcode commented on Issue #2724:

@cfallin I've now submitted https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/2729 to fix that test.
